Module mesakit.map.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.canvas

Interface MapProjection

All Known Implementing Classes:
CartesianMapProjection, MapCanvas, SphericalMercatorMapProjection
public interface MapProjection
Maps between drawing coordinates, as expressed by Drawing* objects, and map coordinates, as expressed by Location, Latitude, Longitude, Rectangle Distance, Width, Height and Size. The projection area has an origin at 0, 0 in the upper left and an extent defined by drawingSize()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    drawingSize()
    Returns the drawing area in drawing coordinates in the coordinate system for this projection
    Rectangle
    mapArea()
    Returns the map area as a Rectangle in latitude and longitude
